title: CBS shifts 'Angel,' '2 Broke Girls' premieres
text:
CBS shifts 'Angel,' '2 Broke Girls' premieres One of CBS' new fall shows will now premiere in midseason. Post to Facebook CBS shifts 'Angel,' '2 Broke Girls' premieres One of CBS' new fall shows will now premiere in midseason. Join the Conversation To find out more about Facebook commenting please read the Conversation Guidelines and FAQs CBS shifts 'Angel,''2 Broke Girls' premieres Bill Keveney, USA TODAY 3:56 p.m. EDT October 14, 2015 Maggie Lawson, left, and Jane Lynch star in CBS''Angel From Hell.' (Photo: Cliff Lipson, CBS) CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
One of CBS' new fall shows will now premiere in midseason. 
The network Wednesday pushed back Angel from Hell 's first episode from November until February. Fifth-season comedy, 2 Broke Girls , which was scheduled for a midseason return, will take Angel 's slot, premiering Nov. 12. 
Broke Girls will be part of a CBS scripted lineup that replaces NFL games when the network's Thursday football schedule finishes its run in November. 
On Nov. 5, the network's lineup will open with The Big Bang Theory and freshman Life in Pieces , which both move from Monday. They will be followed by the Season 3 premiere of Mom and a Big Bang rerun, leading into the fourth-season premiere of Elementary . On Nov. 12, Broke Girls ' Season 5 opener will fill the Big Bang rerun slot at 9:30 p.m. ET/PT. 
Angel From Hell stars Jane Lynch as Amy, a larger-than-life, booze-swilling woman who claims to be the guardian angel of Allison (Maggie Lawson), an intense, young doctor. Read or Share this story: http://on.wtsp.com/1RIv2pN More Stories
